snippet: In its program at Zankel Hall, the period-instrument ensemble L’Arpeggiata featured music that worked better live than on the disc.
abstract: Allan Kozinn reviews performance by period-instrument ensemble L'Arpeggiata at Zankel Hall as part of Carnegie Hall Perspectives series.
lead_paragraph: In its program at Zankel Hall, the period-instrument ensemble L’Arpeggiata featured music that worked better live than on the disc.

headline.seo: L’Arpeggiata’s Period Instruments at Zankel Hall
headline.main: Hopping Into Cultures, Skipping Across Centuries
headline.print_headline: Hopping Into Cultures, Skipping Across Centuries
